attributes.action: Ask the British people if they would like to have a Republic.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all know that true democracy can only be achieved when peoples have an opportunity of voting for their head of state at regular intervals, as in most other democratic countries of the world ie the United States, France,etc. Kings and Queens belong to the historic past. I cannot accept that a person can be head of state by accident of birth for life. It is quite simply undemocratic and we have no right to encourage democracy in other countries, if we do not practice it ourselves, that is hypocrisy beyond belief.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
